Articles.Content:
I've been experiencing some problem with the landing legs, not landing gear sorry. The problem is, when i turn the landing leg it goes inward and turns slightly and i just can't seem to get it to go outward into the landing position i guess. Although i have installed mods which include...

TAC Life Support, Tweakscale (just installed today) and... actually that's pretty much it.
Not sure what you mean, the legs have been ok. Can you post some screenshots or a vid to show.
